title: MA60055: Computational Fluid Dynamics - Quick Facts
text:

Course name | Computational Fluid Dynamics
Offered by | Mathematics
Credits | 4
L-T-P | 3-1-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Spring

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: Fluid MechanicsGoverning equation of Fluid Dynamics, conservation form, simple CFD techniques, Lax-Wendroff technique, Mac Cormacks techniques, finite volume method, application to Euler equations, upwind difference scheme, viscous flow solutions, staggered grid, SIMPLE Algorithm, SOLA Algorithm, boundary element method and application to potential flows.
